summary.conference_name: 33rd IEEE International Conference on Software Analysis, Evolution and Reengineering (SANER 2026)
summary.location: 5* St. Raphael Resort and Marina, Limassol, Cyprus

call_for_papers.description: Invitation for high-quality, original, and unpublished research papers. Topics of interest include software analysis, evolution, and reengineering, covering various areas such as AI for Software Engineering, software maintenance, program comprehension, software visualization, and more.

submission_instructions.peer_review_process: All submissions will undergo rigorous peer review based on originality, quality, soundness, and relevance.
format_requirements: Conform to IEEE Conference Proceedings Formatting Guidelines

track_requirements.Research Track: Max 12 pages (last 2 pages for references only)
track_requirements.Industrial Papers Track: Max 12 pages (last 2 for references only) for full papers; talk proposals max 2 pages
track_requirements.Short Papers and Posters Track: Max 6 pages (including all text, figures, references, and appendices); posters max 2 pages
track_requirements.Early Research Achievement (ERA) Track: Max 6 pages (last 1 page for references only)
track_requirements.Reproducibility Studies and Negative Res: Max 5 pages for appendices; max 12 pages for new reproducibility studies
track_requirements.Registered Report Track: Max 7 pages (last 1 page for references only)

submission_instructions.double_anonymous_review: Applicable to Research, Short Papers and Posters, ERA, and RENE Tracks

call_for_papers.special_journal_issue: Authors of selected papers will be invited to submit revised versions for a special issue in Springer's Empirical Software Engineering Journal.

workshop_information.description: Proposals for workshops highlighting specific topics related to the conference themes are being solicited.
organization_requirements: Provide a link to the workshop website

tutorial_information.description: Proposals for insightful tutorials on software analysis, evolution, and reengineering.

organizing_committee.General Chair: Georgia Kapitsaki, University of Cyprus, Cyprus
organizing_committee.Local Organizing Chair: George Angelos Papadopoulos, University of Cyprus, Cyprus
Program Chairs: Eunjong Choi, Kyoto Institute of Technology, Japan
Matthias Galster, University of Canterbury, New Zealand
Industrial Chairs: Anne Etien, University of Lille, France
shortPapersAndPostersChairs: Eleni Constantinou, University of Cyprus, Cyprus
Sandro Schulze, Anhalt University of Applied Sciences, Germany
workshopTutorialChairs: Marcelo De Almeida Maia, Federal University of Uberlandia, Brazil
Juri Di Rocco, University of L'Aquila, Italy
